p: Many researchers have tried to analyze the antimicrobial functions of Kombucha; for instance, Steinkraus et al. in their valuable works proved that Kombucha has excellent antimicrobial activity against several microorganisms including Staphylococcus aureus, Agrobacterium tumefaciens, E. coli, and Helicobacter pylori that this good activity can be attributed to its acetic acid content [ 20, 21].
